content: commitment to values-based leadership. 1.3 Challenges with governance of enterprise AI With the rise in popularity of ChatGPT4 and other consumer AI tools, organizations have been looking for ways to apply these capabilities also to their business environment. Like other technologies, transitioning from customer to business usage comes with specific challenges. This chapter describes the main challenges as they relate to the governance of an organization's AI initiatives. 1.3.1 Generative AI has changed the governance game While business teams are smitten by the potential for business improvement, and the technical specialists are enamored by the latest technological breakthroughs, generative AI is different (enough) from earlier forms of AI to approach them thoughtfully.
